alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 1:25PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Mississippi, central Tipton and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Munford, or 8 miles south of Fort Pillow State Park, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Pillow State Park, Munford, Fulton, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Drummonds, Beaver and Randolph. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
